content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1547348201842{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Capture3.jpg?id=1339) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

What Drives Us

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548112338068{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

The ATR International Story

In 1988, two immigrants came together to solve the headaches typically associated with technical staffing. Their collaboration created one of the industry’s most diverse companies: ATR International.

 

For over 30 years, the Brenholz family has provided a guiding light for the industry. By overcoming early adversity and the unique challenges that come along with being a premier minority-owned business, they’ve built an inclusive company that will thrive for generations.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548112495194{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

A Big Tech Local with Nationwide Reach

ATR International made its home in Santa Clara, California, in the heart of Silicon Valley. As a result, the company is plugged directly into the technology industry and has developed the resources to establish a nationwide footprint. In addition to providing staffing services to startups and Fortune 500s across the U.S., ATR has significant experience working with leading VMS and MSP providers. As a top Diverse Supplier and MBE, ATR is dedicated to advancing the minority business community while delivering results for clients and candidates each and every day. ATR celebrates diversity within its own workforce, providing unique viewpoints and fresh perspectives that power solutions for businesses and job seekers alike.

 

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”statistics-row”][vc_column_inner el_class=”col green-border-bottom” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

35,000

placements

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”col green-border-bottom” width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

34 Million

working hours

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1410″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Making the world a better place,

one job at a time.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Our Promise

To deliver next-generation recruiting that enables business and communities to thrive.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Core Values

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1643″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Integrity

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1644″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Passion for Excellence

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1796″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

Trust

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_separator color=”custom” el_class=”hr-green”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Awards and Recognitions

2022 SIA List of Diversity-Owned Staffing Firms – 2022 Ethics in Sales Award (The Stevie® Awards) – 2021 SIA DE&I Influencers List: Angelique Alvarez – 2021 Latinx Business Leadership Awards (Silicon Valley Business Journal)  –  2021 40 Under 40: President & CEO Andrea Brenholz (Silicon Valley Business Journal)  –  2020 Latino Business Leadership Award (Silicon Valley Business Journal)  –  2018 OMNI500 Top Businesses – 2017 NMSDC National Supplier of the Year – 2017 WRMSDC Supplier of the Year – 2016 Diversity.com Top Diversity Owned Businesses – 2015 WRMSDC Supplier of the Year 2015 Diversity.com Top 500 Diverse Businesses – 2015 WRMSDC Volunteer of the Year – 2015 Certified Green Business – 2014 NMSDC Regional Supplier of the Year – 2014 WRMSDC Volunteer of the Year

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_separator color=”custom” el_class=”hr-green”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Organizations We’re A Part Of

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1511″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1512″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1501″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1513″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1503″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1508″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1509″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1510″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Join our Team



[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • The leadership team is honest, supportive, and helpful which helps employees to grow their careers, as well as personally. The offices nationwide are made up of great people who work hard to reach goals, build relationships, and have fun while doing so! Excellent training program. Great benefits and fair compensation offered. Proud to be a member of the ATR team!

     

    -ATR Employee

  • ATR has been my favorite company that I've ever worked for. It's small enough to feel like family, yet big enough to have us spread across the country. The work world is constantly changing and I think ATR is changing too. I greatly enjoy all of my coworkers and think the leadership team is transparent.

     

    -ATR Employee

  • I’ve been with ATR for over a decade, going on two, and have had a wonderful experience. At times it feels like I run my own business under the ATR name, which is great. The name ATR is a big benefit since it attracts quality candidates and clients.

     

    -ATR Employee

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row]
